alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 11:40PM PST until December 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, heaviest above 2500 feet. Heaviest accumulations should also remain south of Mount Jefferson. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Accumulations will become more spotty in nature as precipitation turns more showery overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
